name: 陳怡倩
objective:
This course aims to introduce the foundational principles of qualitative and quantitative research methodologies. It provides learners with a conceptual and practical grounding in research design, enabling them to conduct methodologically sound explorations and investigations across both paradigms. Furthermore, the course examines the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) tools in the research process—highlighting their applications in data collection, transcription, coding, and analysis—to enhance research efficiency, accuracy, and depth.
本課程旨在介紹質性與量化研究方法的基本原理，並為學習者提供研究設計的概念基礎與實務能力，使其能夠在兩種研究範式中進行方法嚴謹的研究。此外，課程亦將探討人工智慧（AI）工具於研究歷程中的應用，包括在資料蒐集、轉錄、編碼與分析等階段的整合運用，藉此提升研究的效率、準確性與深度。

Week 2 AI Tools for Research; Finding a Research Topic
Week 3 Library Resources; Ethics in Research	
Week 4 Qualitative Research Design
Week 5 Double Tenth Day (no class)
Week 6 Qualitative Data	        	        
Week 7 QRD I: Phenomenological Study        
Week 8 QRD II: Ethnological Study
Week 9 QRD III: Case Study	        
Week 10 AI tools for Qualitative Data Analysis	
Week 11 Quantitative Research 
Week 12 Quantitative Data

Week 14 Quantitative Research Design II: Independent T-test Study
Week 15 Quantitative Research Design III: Correlation Study    
Week 16 Mixed Methods Research Design
Week 17 Final Project Due; Final Project Presentations I       	         
Week 18 Final Project Presentations  II
scorePolicy: Active class participation & class activities (60%); final project & presentation (40%)

課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
